name: Eternal Flame
lyric:
You la yi you la yi you la yi you la yi oh oh oh
Close your eyes
Just give me your hand
Darling do you feel
My heart beating
Do you understand
Do you feel the same
Am I only dreaming
Is this burning
An eternal flame
I believe It's meant to be darling
I watch you when you're sleeping
You belong with me
Do you feel the same
Am I only dreaming
Or is this burning
An eternal flame
Say my name
Sun shines through the rain
Of all life so lonely
Then come and ease the pain
I don't want to lose this feeling
Close your eyes
Give me your hand
Do you feel my heart beating
Do you understand
Do you feel the same
Am I only dreaming
Is this burning
An eternal flame oh oh oh
My heart beating
Do you understand
Do you feel the same
Or am I only dreaming
Is this burning
An eternal flame
La yi la yi
Oh oh da di da da da oh
Dreaming
Is this burning
An eternal flame
